Html:
Hallo,

as newbie with naudio I'm straggeling with PCM conversion. I want to built a c# applicaion which takes skype calls and transfers the audio bidirectional to a capi call.

Taking the call and dailing capi runs well but I don't know how to resample audio from 16 kHz, 16 bit, mono (Skype) to and from 8 kHz, 8 bit, mono.

I thought of two threads each reading async byte stream and converting it. But I'm not sure if this is a good solution??

So, hoping for hints and/or examples how to do this conversation stuff...

You can do the sample rate conversion with WaveFormatConversionStream, or MediaFoundationResampler.
I'd recommend against using 8 bit audio unless you absolutely need it. Are you actually wanting mu-law/a-law?
